name: Avial
description: A traditional Kerala dish made with mixed vegetables, coconut, and yogurt, seasoned with coconut oil and curry leaves.

name: Puttu and Kadala Curry
description: Steamed cylindrical rice cake served with black chickpea curry, a popular Kerala breakfast dish.

name: Idiyappam with Curry
description: String hoppers made from rice flour, served with coconut milk or curry.

name: Appam with Stew
description: Soft hoppers made from fermented rice batter, served with vegetable or chicken stew.

name: Thalassery Biryani
description: A fragrant biryani from Malabar region made with short-grain rice, spices, and meat.

name: Malabar Parotta
description: Layered flaky flatbread made with maida, served with spicy curries.

name: Kerala Fish Curry
description: Tangy and spicy fish curry cooked with coconut milk and tamarind.

name: Meen Pollichathu
description: Fish marinated with spices, wrapped in banana leaf, and grilled.

name: Erissery
description: A festive dish made with pumpkin, coconut, and spices, served in Onam Sadya.

name: Olan
description: A mild dish made with ash gourd, coconut milk, and curry leaves.

name: Thoran
description: Stir-fried vegetables with grated coconut and mild spices.

name: Pulissery
description: A curd-based curry with ripe mango or cucumber, mildly spiced.

name: Theeyal
description: A curry made with roasted coconut, tamarind, and spices, often cooked with vegetables.

name: Parotta with Beef Curry
description: Layered flaky flatbread served with spicy beef curry.

name: Malabar Biryani
description: Fragrant rice cooked with spices and meat, a specialty of Malabar.

name: Thalassery Biryani
description: A unique biryani from Thalassery, cooked with kaima rice and mild spices.

name: Fish Moilee
description: Kerala-style fish curry cooked in coconut milk with mild spices.

name: Malabar Fish Curry
description: Spicy red fish curry cooked with tamarind and Malabar spices.

name: Unniyappam
description: Sweet rice and jaggery fritters fried in ghee.

name: Appam and Stew
description: Soft and lacy pancakes served with vegetable or chicken stew.
